Application Insights 
Smart meters find applications in sectors such as commercial, industrial and residential. Residential sector dominates the market. Growing population in Asia Pacific countries has increased the demand for residential structure followed by rise in demand of smart meters in coming years. Smart meters record usages and provide data in home display as well as on web page. According to feedback on usages and costs, user can save energy as well as cost associated with it which in turns the rise in demand for the smart meters. Load-variable tariffs as well as time-of-use tariffs offer easy energy consumption management in residential sector. Smart metering also provides the facilitation of home energy management systems (HEMS), which is expected to grow the demand of smart meters globally. 
Residential sector accounted for the largest growing sector and expected to continue with the growth. High power consumption by commercial and industrial sectors, accounted for the largest revenue growth. In these sectors, smart meters are required which are robust, flexible and reliable due to heavy usage. Rise in urbanization has increased the number of industries and production places which is expected to drive the market growth over forecast period.

Regional Insights 
Since evolution of smart meters, North America has witnessed the growth and is expected to continue the growth in coming years. Until now, impact of regulations related to smart meters had more impact in North America and Europe, however its impact is anticipated in Asia Pacific which is expected to increase the growth of the market. Latin America, Africa and Middle East countries are also expected to witness the significant growth of the market due to electricity demand owing to rising economic conditions in near future.
